text:
yaja#mAnaSca sIdata || 
prEddhO# agnE dIdihi puqrO nO&ja#srayA sUqrmyA# yaviShTha | 
tvA(gm) SaSva#ntaq upa# yantiq vAjA$H || 
viqdhEma# tE paraqmE janma#nnagnE viqdhEmaq stOmaiqrava#rE saqdhasthE$ | 
yasmAqd-yOnE#ruqdAri#thAq yajEq taM pratvE haqvI(gm)Shi# juhurEq sami#ddhE || 
tA(gm) sa#viqturvarE$Nyasya ciqtrAmA&haM ~MvRu#NE sumaqtiM ~MviqSvaja#nyAM | 
yAma#syaq kaNvOq adu#haqt prapI#nA(gm) saqhasra#dhArAqM - [  ] 24
